'''0.0.15a'''<ref>{{ytl|hY0xuFZPOgQ}}</ref> (Multiplayer Test 1) is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on May 31, 2009, at 19:04 UTC, which made changes to lava, textures, and trees.<ref><samp>.jar</samp> file has a compilation time of 21:04 UTC+2.</ref><ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''[13:05] <@notch> http://www.minecraft.net/mptest/''" (19:05 UTC)</ref> It is the first ever version of ''Minecraft'' with [[multiplayer]] compatibility. This is the only multiplayer test currently archived.

== Additions ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Multiplayer]]'''
* In early access.
* The default server port is 5565, the same one used for ''[[Infiniminer]]'' servers.
* Other players are rendered with the [[mob (entity)|mob]] model.<ref>{{ytl|r8SnlNiYmss}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Dirt JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Dirt]]'''
* Removed redundant textures.

'''[[File:Grass Block JE2.png|32px]] [[Grass Block|Grass]]'''
* Removed redundant textures.

'''[[File:Gravel JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Gravel]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Gravel JE1.png|32px]].
* Now only generates underwater.

'''[[File:Lava JE3.png|32px]] [[Lava]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Lava JE2.png|32px]].<ref group="note" name="gameplay">This has been verified by gameplay from this version's jar dated May 31, 2009 at 19:04 UTC.</ref>
** It now appears brighter overall.
* Now flows slower than before.
* Liquids directly under a block no longer cause an x-ray effect.

'''[[File:Oak Leaves JE2.png|32px]] [[Leaves]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Oak Leaves JE1.png|32px]].

'''[[File:Oak Log (UD) JE2.png|32px]] [[Log|Wood]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Oak Log (UD) JE1.png|32px]].

'''[[File:Oak Planks JE4.png|32px]] [[Planks]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Oak Planks JE3.png|32px]].

'''[[File:Sand JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Sand]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Sand JE1.png|32px]].

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Steve JE1.png|40px]] [[Mob (entity)|Mobs]]'''
* Animation changed.
** The head and arms no longer flail around as much.<ref group="note" name="gameplay">This has been verified by gameplay from this version's jar dated May 31, 2009 at 19:04 UTC.</ref>

=== World generation ===
'''[[File:Oak JE3.png|32px]] [[Tree]]s'''
* Shape changed from [[File:Oak JE2.png|32px]].

== Removals ==
=== General ===
'''[[Cloud]]'''
* Removed unused texture of what seems to be a wool, cloud, or snow from [[Java Edition 0.0.14a|0.0.14a]].

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* The player can place blocks inside other players in multiplayer.
